title: Coffee and Crafts at Pilot Project Brewing
description: Bring a craft (spoiler: anything is a craft!), meet us at Pilot Project, and enjoy their full espresso bar while you create.

title: Bring-Your-Own-Craft at the WNDR Museum
description: The Chicago Craft Club is partnering with the WNDR Museum for a very special Bring-Your-Own-Craft event! Bring something to work on and create in WNDR's beautiful event space. Attendees will also receive a coupon for discounted museum tickets âœ¨

title: Bring-Your-Own-Craft at Glessner House
description: Come craft with us at the historic Glessner House!

title: Haunted Handicrafts at Art/Work Coworking
description: Bring-your-own-craft or come work on a Halloween craft we will provide for you!
